conbody.p: a. Commands with convenience check oversight responsibility will conduct an annual review of each convenience check account. All checks written in support of a declared ETO must be reviewed within 60 days after completion of the disaster response. This review will include the following:
3) Review of all convenience checks written to individuals.

b. Report suspected violations to appropriate management and investigative authorities. A/OPCs will include in the SAHAR Report a count of convenience check accounts not audited within the past 12 months.
